vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
Included with: ἀσθέν-εια, ἡ,
want of strength, weakness, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; especially feebleness, sickliness, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__2 disease, sickness, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]; δι᾽ ἀσθένειαν[NT]
__3 ἀ. βίου poverty, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__4 in moral sense, feebleness, weakness, τῆς ἀνθρωπίνης φύσεως[Refs 5th c.BC+] to be weak, feeble, sickly, ἀ. μέλη to be weak in limb, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; ἀ. ἀσθένειαν [NT+5th c.BC+]; ἠσθένησε he fell sick, [Refs 4th c.BC+]sick man, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; ἠσθενηκότα[Refs 2nd c.BC+]
__2 to be needy, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; ἠσθενηκότες, of those unable to pay taxes, [Refs 1st c.BC+]
__3 with infinitive, to be too weak to do a thing, not to be able.., [Refs 1st c.AD+]
__4 decline, ἠσθένησεν ἡ ἡμέρα εἰς τὴν ἑσπέραν[LXX]
vocabinfos.relatedNos: [{'strongNumber': 'G0770G', 'matchingForm': 'ἀσθενέω', 'stepTransliteration': 'astheneō', 'gloss': 'be weak: weak', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '軟弱', '_es_Gloss': 'estar débil', '_zh_Gloss': '软弱'}, {'strongNumber': 'G0770H', 'matchingForm': 'ἀσθενέω', 'stepTransliteration': 'astheneō', 'gloss': 'be weak: ill', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '軟弱', '_es_Gloss': 'estar débil', '_zh_Gloss': '软弱'}, {'strongNumber': 'G0771', 'matchingForm': 'ἀσθένημα', 'stepTransliteration': 'asthenēma', 'gloss': 'weakness', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '軟弱', '_es_Gloss': 'debilidad', '_zh_Gloss': '软弱'}, {'strongNumber': 'G0772G', 'matchingForm': 'ἀσθενής', 'stepTransliteration': 'asthenēs', 'gloss': 'weak', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '軟弱', '_es_Gloss': 'débil', '_zh_Gloss': '软弱'}, {'strongNumber': 'G0772H', 'matchingForm': 'ἀσθενής', 'stepTransliteration': 'asthenēs', 'gloss': 'weak: ill', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '軟弱', '_es_Gloss': 'débil', '_zh_Gloss': '软弱'}]
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
to be weak, ill
to be weak, infirm, deficient in strength; to be inefficient, Rom. 8:3; 2Cor. 13:3; to be sick, ill Mt. 25:36; metaphorically to be weak in faith, to doubt, hesitate, be unsettled, timid, Rom. 14:1; 1Cor. 8:9, 11, 12; 2Cor. 11:29; to be deficient in authority, dignity, or power, be contemptible, 2Cor. 11:21; 13:3, 9; to be afflicted, distressed, needy, Acts 20:35; 2Cor. 12:10; 13:4, 9
vocabinfos._es_Definition: estar enfermo o indispuesto ; estar débil
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 生病
2) 軟弱
2a) 身體上的
2b) 外在或內裡的缺乏效率, 柔弱, 無力
2c) 內心生命的軟弱
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
1) 生病
2) 软弱
2a) 身体上的
2b) 外在或内里的缺乏效率, 柔弱, 无力
2c) 内心生命的软弱
